Class XMLInstances

java.lang.Object
  weka.core.xml.XMLDocument
      weka.core.xml.XMLInstances
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, RevisionHandler
public class XMLInstances
extends XMLDocument
implements java.io.Serializable
